events.name: Ukrainian Prime Minister thanks Germany for solidarity and calls for more weapons
events.wd_label: Ukrainian Prime Minister thanks Germany for solidarity and calls for more weapons
events.wd_description: Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal thanked Germany for its solidarity in the face of the Russian invasion and called for more weapons during his visit to Berlin, signaling an easing of tensions between Berlin and Kyiv.
events.description: Ukrainian Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal thanked Germany for its solidarity in the face of the Russian invasion and called for more weapons during his visit to Berlin, signaling an easing of tensions between Berlin and Kyiv.

events.name: Shmyhal's visit
events.wd_description: Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal visited Berlin and was welcomed by German Chancellor Olaf Scholz with military honors.
events.description: Prime Minister Denys Shmyhal visited Berlin and was welcomed by German Chancellor Olaf Scholz with military honors.

events.name: meeting with German officials
events.wd_description: Shmyhal met with German officials, including Chancellor Scholz and President Steinmeier, to discuss the military situation, strengthening sanctions, and the need to provide weapons for Ukraine.
events.description: Shmyhal met with German officials, including Chancellor Scholz and President Steinmeier, to discuss the military situation, strengthening sanctions, and the need to provide weapons for Ukraine.

events.name: Shmyhal's tweet
events.wd_description: Shmyhal tweeted about the discussions held during the meeting, focusing on the military situation, sanctions, and the need for weapons.
events.description: Shmyhal tweeted about the discussions held during the meeting, focusing on the military situation, sanctions, and the need for weapons.

events.name: Shmyhal's statement to German media
events.wd_description: Before his trip, Shmyhal acknowledged Germany's progress in supporting Ukraine with weapons but emphasized the need for more, including modern combat tanks like the Leopard 2.
events.description: Before his trip, Shmyhal acknowledged Germany's progress in supporting Ukraine with weapons but emphasized the need for more, including modern combat tanks like the Leopard 2.

events.name: Ukrainian authorities find 440 unmarked graves in Izium
events.wd_label: Ukrainian authorities find 440 unmarked graves in Izium
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities discovered 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city recently recaptured from Russian forces, and announced plans to show the site to Ukrainian and international journalists.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities discovered 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city recently recaptured from Russian forces, and announced plans to show the site to Ukrainian and international journalists.

events.name: discovery of graves
events.wd_description: Ukrainian authorities found 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city in eastern Ukraine recently recaptured from Russian forces.
events.description: Ukrainian authorities found 440 unmarked graves at a burial site in Izium, a city in eastern Ukraine recently recaptured from Russian forces.

events.name: Zelensky's statement
events.wd_description: President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that Ukrainian and international journalists would be shown the burial site to reveal what the Russian occupation led to.
events.description: President Volodymyr Zelensky stated that Ukrainian and international journalists would be shown the burial site to reveal what the Russian occupation led to.

events.name: Center for Strategic Communications statement
events.wd_description: The Center for Strategic Communications in Ukraine reported that some of the discovered graves were fresh, and that civilians constituted the highest number of those buried.
events.description: The Center for Strategic Communications in Ukraine reported that some of the discovered graves were fresh, and that civilians constituted the highest number of those buried.

events.name: context of Izium's occupation
events.wd_description: Izium, subjected to intense artillery attacks from Russia in April, became a crucial hub for the invading military during five months of occupation.
events.description: Izium, subjected to intense artillery attacks from Russia in April, became a crucial hub for the invading military during five months of occupation.

events.name: Ukraine restarts grain exports amidst concerns over Russian missile strike
events.wd_label: Ukraine restarts grain exports amidst concerns over Russian missile strike
events.wd_description: The Ukrainian government is working to restart grain exports from its Black Sea ports to ease global food shortages, warning that further Russian missile strikes could disrupt deliveries.
events.description: The Ukrainian government is working to restart grain exports from its Black Sea ports to ease global food shortages, warning that further Russian missile strikes could disrupt deliveries.

events.name: efforts to restart exports
events.wd_description: The Ukrainian government is proceeding with efforts to restart grain exports from its Black Sea ports to ease global food shortages.
events.description: The Ukrainian government is proceeding with efforts to restart grain exports from its Black Sea ports to ease global food shortages.

events.name: Zelenskiy's condemnation
events.wd_description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy denounced the Russian missile strike in Odesa as "barbaric" and expressed doubts about Moscow's trustworthiness in implementing the grain export deal.
events.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy denounced the Russian missile strike in Odesa as "barbaric" and expressed doubts about Moscow's trustworthiness in implementing the grain export deal.

events.name: infrastructure minister's statement
events.wd_description: Minister for Infrastructure Oleksandr Kubrakov stated that technical preparations for the launch of agricultural product exports from Ukrainian ports are ongoing.
events.description: Minister for Infrastructure Oleksandr Kubrakov stated that technical preparations for the launch of agricultural product exports from Ukrainian ports are ongoing.

events.name: grain export deal
events.wd_description: Moscow and Kyiv signed a deal to restore Ukrainian grain shipments to pre-war levels of 5 million tonnes a month, aimed at reducing global food prices.
events.description: Moscow and Kyiv signed a deal to restore Ukrainian grain shipments to pre-war levels of 5 million tonnes a month, aimed at reducing global food prices.

events.name: SPARAR's new battery factory in West Virginia
events.wd_label: SPARAR's new battery factory in West Virginia
events.wd_description: SPARAR announced the construction of a new factory in West Virginia, spurred by the Inflation Reduction Act, to produce cobalt-free storage devices and contribute to domestic battery production.
events.description: SPARAR announced the construction of a new factory in West Virginia, spurred by the Inflation Reduction Act, to produce cobalt-free storage devices and contribute to domestic battery production.

events.name: factory construction
events.wd_description: The 482,000-square-foot factory will be built in Bridgeport, West Virginia, employing 350 people initially.
events.description: The 482,000-square-foot factory will be built in Bridgeport, West Virginia, employing 350 people initially.

events.name: workforce development
events.wd_description: SPARAR has an agreement with the United Mine Workers to hire and train idled workers, potentially revitalizing coal country.
events.description: SPARAR has an agreement with the United Mine Workers to hire and train idled workers, potentially revitalizing coal country.

events.name: production focus
events.wd_description: Initially, the factory will produce batteries for forklifts, farm equipment, and energy storage, with plans to expand to electric vehicle batteries.
events.description: Initially, the factory will produce batteries for forklifts, farm equipment, and energy storage, with plans to expand to electric vehicle batteries.

events.name: future plans
events.wd_description: The factory aims to gear up for the anticipated boom in the electric vehicle market, with EVs expected to make up 25% of cars by 2025 and 50% by 2030 in the U.S.
events.description: The factory aims to gear up for the anticipated boom in the electric vehicle market, with EVs expected to make up 25% of cars by 2025 and 50% by 2030 in the U.S.
